thread.title: A Young Jon Stewart Interviews George Carlin in a 1997 Tribute to the Comedy Legend
thread.title_full: A Young Jon Stewart Interviews George Carlin in a 1997 Tribute to the Comedy Legend

author: Glen Tickle
title: A Young Jon Stewart Interviews George Carlin in a 1997 Tribute to the Comedy Legend
text:
A young Jon Stewart spoke with the late George Carlin in a 1997 interview from the HBO special George Carlin: 40 Years of Comedy . During the interview, Carlin talked about his early life and how his upbringing prepared him for a career in comedy.
Related Laughing Squid Posts Remembering Comedian George Carlin Through the Years Early Louis C.K. Standup Comedy From the 1980s and 1990s The Current and Vintage Comic Stylings of Jerry Stiller and Anne Meara
